blog.name: cheerful-liz
blog.title: Livin’ Life In Pink
blog.description: ~Liz~🏳️‍🌈Psych major,20

body:
Alright, I’m gonna say it-

Dan and Phil inspire the fuck out of me, truly. To have watched them evolve over the years and to think that Phil just decided to start making videos one day and then all of this happened is crazy. It’s given me hope that maybe achieving some dreams isn’t that far out of reach if I’d just go for it.

When Dan came out, it affected me so much. Here I’d been going through all of the same self-hatred (the internalized oppression basically) and thinking that I was alone for all of these years. To have someone who young me looked up to and grew up watching for so many years make such a big statement was amazing. I can only imagine how many younger fans have been helped by the things he’s said. To have that much power and use it so responsibly and for the best of reasons is a trait of a truly beautiful person.

I believe that things happen for a reason, even if I don’t know what makes that occur. It was literally by chance that I clicked on one of their videos all of those years ago, but I’m glad that I did.

blog.title: 𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖑 シ
blog.description: ❝𝐈'𝐯𝐞 𝐛𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐦𝐲𝐬𝐞𝐥𝐟 𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐛𝐢𝐫𝐭𝐡❞┆𝐬𝐡𝐞 / 𝐡𝐞𝐫 ♡ 𝐬𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐞𝐧 ♡ 𝐚 𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐛𝐥𝐨𝐛

body:
Dan and Phil

♡ — 𝑡𝑤𝑜 𝑝𝑒𝑜𝑝𝑙𝑒 𝑤𝘩𝑜 𝑓𝑒𝑒𝑙 𝑙𝑖𝑘𝑒 𝘩𝑜𝑚𝑒…

to people who aren’t in the Phandom, Dan and Phil may be just two more obsessions of people globally. Another celebrity they’d want to marry. Nothing that important, right?

And then you delve deeper into the Phandom to discover people; actual millions of people, who found them as they were going through the roughest times in their lives, and had no one to turn to. You find people who spent the majority of their lives feeling alone, not worth it… and now they feel like they ARE worth it.

Don’t just say that Daniel Howell and Phillip Lester are “"just two dudes from the internet”“ and ”‘they aren’t important"“ because, to millions of people, they are their saviours

I know this from personal experience. I’ve been in the phandom for 7+ years, and they’ve been the one thing I could always rely on. Whether it was from their quotes of encouragement and inspiration, to just being their natural, goofy selves in front of the camera for millions of people. I felt alone in my teen years… they made me feel not so alone. Like the older brothers I always wanted and never had.

So please, take time to remember this…

♡ Love You ♡

blog.name: ahappydnp
blog.description: keelin. 26. she/her. will rant about the things i love until you're sick of me. ao3

tags: welcome to my blog where its always loving phil happy hour
summary: no let’s analyze why you’re into angry Phil! miss psychology
question: no let’s analyze why you’re into angry Phil! miss psychology
answer:
You can’t use my degrees against me, that’s not how this works!

Listen…angry/serious/judgmental Phil is hot, okay. Remember when Dan accidentally bonked him during a m&g? Oof.

It’s a side we very rarely see and it just feel authentic? Like he’s a real human person? Especially during the mid years where it was pretty much the AP persona all the time. It’s just nice to see his multifaceted personality. Because he’s interesting and creative and still such a mystery…

(But let’s face it. All versions of Phil are hot)

blog.name: lokissceptres
blog.title: Loki + Tom
blog.description: Feel free to use my imagines just tag me, all inclusive imagines, asks are open

body:
Adorable (Drabble)

Pairing: Punk!Phil x Pastel!Dan (AU)

Warnings: Fluff, sexual tension, gay obviously, fem clothing, insecurity, thighs!, piercings

Summary: Dan and Phil being in love

Note: I needed to write this bc I don’t see it enough and I love this au + I’m not assuming anything about Dan or Phil and I respect their privacy this is entirely fiction

If you’ve never got mixed feeelings from a fan fiction before well this is the one that will change everything

-

Dan loved wearing pastel. Pastel skirts, pastel jeans, pastel crop tops, pastel flower crowns… you get the idea. As much as he loved it, there was a catch. He could only bring himself to wear it at home and very nearly had panic attacks whenever someone saw him, which was why when Phil Lester showed up on his doorstep he almost pissed his white skirt.

“Hey Daniel” Phil breathed, running his hand through his already slicked back hair. Dan looked hot, for lack of a better word. His cute curly hair had a pastel pink flower crown on top, to match that he had a pastel oversized jumper tucked into a short white skirt. However, the gap between Dans thigh high socks and the hem of his skirt is what caught Phils eye the most. Fuck. Phil knew Dan wore pastel clothes, he’d been to the boys house before, but he didn’t know he wore this.

The pastel boy rubbed his soft thighs together as he locked his chocolate eyes with Phils icy blue ones. Phil could’ve melted in that boys eyes.

“Hey Phil” Dan replied softly, admiring Phils all black outfit.

“Can I, uh, come in?” Phil rasped. Dan replied with a soft ‘mhmm’, refusing to meet Phils eyes. Phil was seriously going to melt, this boy was just so adorable.

Dan watched as Phil entered. Phils adam’s apple moved slightly as he swallowed his newfound nerves, Dans thoughts began to go rogue after seeing that. Dan loved Phils piercings, he had 4 piercings on each ear, an eyebrow piercing and snakebites, very much contrasting to the pair of small silver hoops Dan had in his own ears. Dan wanted nothing more but to stare and nip at those piercings and to feel them against his own skin.

Phil followed Dan up the stairs removing his leather jacket as he went. When Dan had plopped onto his soft Queen sized bed he had a chance to take in Phil properly. Tattoos crept from underneath Phils shirt and up his neck, they also seemed to crawl down his arms and that’s when Dan found himself entranced in Phils biceps.

“Dan?” Phil said now sitting opposite Dan, watching Dan stare lovingly at him.

“Yeah?” Dan squeaked. “oh” he said, realising he’d been caught.

“You look great by the way…” Phil said almost awkwardly, biting his snakebites. Dan instantly turned red and hid his face in his hands. He forgot he was wearing that.

“I-I’m gonna go change wait a minute” he said tearing up, he couldn’t control his nerves especially since it was Phil. Here’s a secret, Dan has had a crush on Phil for quite a while now but Dan has been too scared to say anything. He didn’t know if Phil was even remotely interested in boys nevermind him.

As Dan got up to change Phil grabbed his hand and pulled him back down, making him fall backwards into Phils lap. Dan stared innocently into Phils eyes before realising what had just happened. He hid his face in his hands again. God why was there so much embarrassment today!

“Im serious Dan” Phil said gently, removing Dans hands from his face and stroking Dans cheek, “You look amazing”

It was safe to say Dans heart was going crazy. He couldn’t even feel Phils hand on his face because it had gone numb from the sudden rush of blood.

“Piss off” Dan murmered, still incredibly embarrassed.

“No Daniel, you seriously look beautiful” Phil said, picking Dan up and holding him against his chest. Dans body was so soft and small compared to his, Phil thought that if he pressed any harder Dan would break.

“You don’t look so bad yourself” Dan whispered, looking down, refusing to make any eyecontact.

“What was that Daniel?” Phil said, lifting Dans chin up with his fingers. Phil didn’t know what he was feeling, he was horny, in love and flustered all at once and he was sure Dan could tell since he was right on Phils lap.

Dan knew that he wasn’t going to be able to say that again so without thinking he went and left a soft peck on Phils cheek. Phil very nearly almost squealed. This boy was seriously something else. Phil returned the favour to which Dan hid his face in Phils neck. At least it wasn’t his hands this time. Phil noticed that Dans face was really soft and it made him wonder if that was true for everything else, but he stopped himself from ruining such a pure moment.

Phil stroked Dans hair gently. “You really are adorable” he chuckled.

It was safe to say Dans heart was going crazy. He couldn’t even feel Phils hand on his face because it had gone numb from the sudden rush of blood.

“Piss off” Dan murmered, still incredibly embarrassed.

“No Daniel, you seriously look beautiful” Phil said, picking Dan up and holding him against his chest. Dans body was so soft and small compared to his, Phil thought that if he pressed any harder Dan would break.

“You don’t look so bad yourself” Dan whispered, looking down, refusing to make any eyecontact.

“What was that Daniel?” Phil said, lifting Dans chin up with his fingers. Phil didn’t know what he was feeling, he was horny, in love and flustered all at once and he was sure Dan could tell since he was right on Phils lap.

Dan knew that he wasn’t going to be able to say that again so without thinking he went and left a soft peck on Phils cheek. Phil very nearly almost squealed. This boy was seriously something else. Phil returned the favour to which Dan hid his face in Phils neck. At least it wasn’t his hands this time. Phil noticed that Dans face was really soft and it made him wonder if that was true for everything else, but he stopped himself from ruining such a pure moment.

Phil stroked Dans hair gently. “You really are adorable” he chuckled.

trail.content_raw:
Adorable (Drabble)

Pairing: Punk!Phil x Pastel!Dan (AU)

Warnings: Fluff, sexual tension, gay obviously, fem clothing, insecurity, thighs!, piercings

Summary: Dan and Phil being in love

Note: I needed to write this bc I don’t see it enough and I love this au + I’m not assuming anything about Dan or Phil and I respect their privacy this is entirely fiction

If you’ve never got mixed feeelings from a fan fiction before well this is the one that will change everything

-

Dan loved wearing pastel. Pastel skirts, pastel jeans, pastel crop tops, pastel flower crowns… you get the idea. As much as he loved it, there was a catch. He could only bring himself to wear it at home and very nearly had panic attacks whenever someone saw him, which was why when Phil Lester showed up on his doorstep he almost pissed his white skirt.

“Hey Daniel” Phil breathed, running his hand through his already slicked back hair. Dan looked hot, for lack of a better word. His cute curly hair had a pastel pink flower crown on top, to match that he had a pastel oversized jumper tucked into a short white skirt. However, the gap between Dans thigh high socks and the hem of his skirt is what caught Phils eye the most. Fuck. Phil knew Dan wore pastel clothes, he’d been to the boys house before, but he didn’t know he wore this.

The pastel boy rubbed his soft thighs together as he locked his chocolate eyes with Phils icy blue ones. Phil could’ve melted in that boys eyes.

“Hey Phil” Dan replied softly, admiring Phils all black outfit.

“Can I, uh, come in?” Phil rasped. Dan replied with a soft ‘mhmm’, refusing to meet Phils eyes. Phil was seriously going to melt, this boy was just so adorable.

Dan watched as Phil entered. Phils adam’s apple moved slightly as he swallowed his newfound nerves, Dans thoughts began to go rogue after seeing that. Dan loved Phils piercings, he had 4 piercings on each ear, an eyebrow piercing and snakebites, very much contrasting to the pair of small silver hoops Dan had in his own ears. Dan wanted nothing more but to stare and nip at those piercings and to feel them against his own skin.

Phil followed Dan up the stairs removing his leather jacket as he went. When Dan had plopped onto his soft Queen sized bed he had a chance to take in Phil properly. Tattoos crept from underneath Phils shirt and up his neck, they also seemed to crawl down his arms and that’s when Dan found himself entranced in Phils biceps.

“Dan?” Phil said now sitting opposite Dan, watching Dan stare lovingly at him.

“Yeah?” Dan squeaked. “oh” he said, realising he’d been caught.

“You look great by the way…” Phil said almost awkwardly, biting his snakebites. Dan instantly turned red and hid his face in his hands. He forgot he was wearing that.

“I-I’m gonna go change wait a minute” he said tearing up, he couldn’t control his nerves especially since it was Phil. Here’s a secret, Dan has had a crush on Phil for quite a while now but Dan has been too scared to say anything. He didn’t know if Phil was even remotely interested in boys nevermind him.

As Dan got up to change Phil grabbed his hand and pulled him back down, making him fall backwards into Phils lap. Dan stared innocently into Phils eyes before realising what had just happened. He hid his face in his hands again. God why was there so much embarrassment today!

“Im serious Dan” Phil said gently, removing Dans hands from his face and stroking Dans cheek, “You look amazing”

It was safe to say Dans heart was going crazy. He couldn’t even feel Phils hand on his face because it had gone numb from the sudden rush of blood.

“Piss off” Dan murmered, still incredibly embarrassed.

“No Daniel, you seriously look beautiful” Phil said, picking Dan up and holding him against his chest. Dans body was so soft and small compared to his, Phil thought that if he pressed any harder Dan would break.

“You don’t look so bad yourself” Dan whispered, looking down, refusing to make any eyecontact.

“What was that Daniel?” Phil said, lifting Dans chin up with his fingers. Phil didn’t know what he was feeling, he was horny, in love and flustered all at once and he was sure Dan could tell since he was right on Phils lap.

Dan knew that he wasn’t going to be able to say that again so without thinking he went and left a soft peck on Phils cheek. Phil very nearly almost squealed. This boy was seriously something else. Phil returned the favour to which Dan hid his face in Phils neck. At least it wasn’t his hands this time. Phil noticed that Dans face was really soft and it made him wonder if that was true for everything else, but he stopped himself from ruining such a pure moment.

Phil stroked Dans hair gently. “You really are adorable” he chuckled.
